name: Finished play testing, works great
description:
You are recruited to play test games made by an AI. You download the program and launch it. Unfortunately, it seems the games aren't quite ready yet, and the AI, who is in complete control of the program, refuses to let you leave until they are... 

(Press ESC to force quit the game. Only use as an emergency though as using it wouldn't be very rp of you. If no emergency, simply use alt+f4 or the X button. You'll understand.)

Note:

You need the "Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable" but you most likely already installed but if the game crashes on startup try installing it

Code by TheDerpie

Art by Vole (+ Kenney's assets)

Music/sfx by Osun
